conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query: fetch ${MONITORED_RESOURCE}| filter resource.service == '${SERVICE_NAME}' && resource.project_id == '${PROJECT_ID}'| { metric ${METRIC_USAGE_TYPE}| align next_older(1d)| group_by [metric.quota_metric, resource.location], max(val()); metric ${METRIC_LIMIT_TYPE}| filter ${QUOTA_FILTER} ${DIMENSIONS_FILTER}| align next_older(1d)| group_by [metric.quota_metric, resource.location], min(val())}| ratio| every 1m| condition gt(val(), 0.8 '1')
